tweet.text: 🎉 Thank you for celebrating the 30th anniversary of the #FRUS public law, 100 years of @HistoryAtState, and 160 years of FRUS with us! We hope you enjoyed #FavoriteFRUS We look forward to 100 more years of U.S. foreign relations, governmental transparency, and public history! https://t.co/1cpIZ9hKgq
tweet.html: 🎉 Thank you for celebrating the 30th anniversary of the #FRUS public law, 100 years of @HistoryAtState, and 160 years of FRUS with us! We hope you enjoyed #FavoriteFRUS We look forward to 100 more years of U.S. foreign relations, governmental transparency, and public history!
